parameters.name: meshName
parameters.description: The name of the service mesh that the virtual service resides in.

parameters.name: virtualServiceName
parameters.description: The name of the virtual service to describe.

nested_items.name: virtualService
nested_items.description: The full description of your virtual service.

nested_items.name: meshName
nested_items.description: The name of the service mesh that the virtual service resides in.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The full Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the resource.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The Unix epoch timestamp in seconds for when the resource was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The Unix epoch timestamp in seconds for when the resource was last updated.

nested_items.name: meshOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services IAM account ID of the service mesh owner. If the account ID is not your own, then it's the ID of the account that shared the mesh with your account. For more information about mesh sharing, see Working with shared meshes.

nested_items.name: resourceOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services IAM account ID of the resource owner. If the account ID is not your own, then it's the ID of the mesh owner or of another account that the mesh is shared with. For more information about mesh sharing, see Working with shared meshes.

nested_items.name: uid
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the resource.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the resource. Resources are created at version 1, and this version is incremented each time that they're updated.

nested_items.name: virtualNode
nested_items.description: The virtual node associated with a virtual service.

nested_items.name: virtualNodeName
nested_items.description: The name of the virtual node that is acting as a service provider.

nested_items.name: virtualRouter
nested_items.description: The virtual router associated with a virtual service.

nested_items.name: virtualRouterName
nested_items.description: The name of the virtual router that is acting as a service provider.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the virtual service.

nested_items.name: virtualServiceName
nested_items.description: The name of the virtual service.
